name: Visited Indicator
description: This will put a border around all links that changes color based on what links you have visited in the past.
additional_info:
This is a slightly altered version of Mateus Amorim Global visited hover indicator - animated. His will only show if the link is visited when you hover over it which looks much nicer but sacrifices quickly being able to see at a glance where you have been. 

the OG can be found here https://userstyles.org/styles/141859/global-visited-hover-indicator-animated
